entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 25 except 19 near the lake.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this morning. High 25 except 19 near the lake. Humidex 27. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
